p: The eHealth Literacy Questionnaire (eHLQ) is a psychometrically robust multidimensional tool designed to be used to understand and evaluate peopleâ€™s interaction with digital health services [ 45]. The eHLQ consists of 7 scales capturing various attributes of the users and the intersection between users and technologies. The applied Swedish version of the eHLQ (translated from English) is currently undergoing validation testing (the results will be published during 2020).
